content.text:
Welcome to your custom setting page.
You can change, how this page looks in your form.json (plugin_data/CustomSetting/form.json).

§l§cFORMATTING CODES REFERENCE:§r

§0Black Text §1Dark Blue §2Dark Green §3Dark Aqua
§4Dark Red §5Dark Purple §6Gold §7Gray
§8Dark Gray §9Blue §aGreen §bAqua
§cRed §dLight Purple §eYellow §fWhite

§lBold Text§r §oItalic Text§r
§kObfuscated Text§r §rReset Formatting

§9Combine §l§9formatting §l§9§ocodes§r for §c§l§ncreative§r text!

§l§cSERVER INFO§r

§6Welcome to our Minecraft server!§r

§bServer Rules:§r
§a1. §fBe respectful to all players
§a2. §fNo griefing or stealing
§a3. §fNo hacking or using unfair advantages
§a4. §fHave fun!

§l§9SERVER FEATURES:§r
§e• §dCustom enchantments
§e• §dWeekly events
§e• §dFriendly community
§e• §dPlayer shops

§o§7Contact us at example@server.com for support§r

§l§2DONATION INFO:§r
§fSupport our server by donating at §nwww.serverdonation.com§r

§kMYSTERY TEXT§r §l§4IMPORTANT§r §o§5NOTICE§r
